Title: Lo que hizo un geranio
Creator: Silva, Josefina

Title: Sexualidad y metapoesía: Cuatro poemas de Julia Alvarez
Creator: Umpierre, Luz Maria
About: Article discussing the importance of Latina voices in literature and how the shifting of feminine portrayal begins in literature. " When you touch a poem, you touch a woman." Various demeaning ways in which women are portrayed in literature are discussed. As well, the author states that in order to love a woman, one must rid the self of women's traditional roles.
Subject: Sexuality

Title: Capacidad, firmeza y valor civil de la mujer
Creator: Trillo, Emilia E.
About: Dialogue given at the First Baptist Church of Chihuahua describing that the general sentiment of women in society is that they are incapable, weak and cowards. It's explained that this thought persists because of men's egoism. It further explains that a woman can be taught to be capable if she is educated. It further explains that the mexican woman is a "slave of the home." Finally, it showcases a story about a young man that could finish school due to his adoptive mother's support with the daily everyday activities.
Subject: Didactic literature, man-woman relationships, social conditions of women

Title: Don Juan
Creator: [Unknown]
About: Review of "Don Juan" by Lord Byron describing that the idea of donjuanismo is present throughout literature in different cultures. It mentions that there are females that may be stimulated and ignited by the romanticized idea of a Don Juan. It further proposes that what women truly desire is care and soft touches. Further, it explains that this is a positive character characteristic about Don Juan that wasn't availble in our literature until recently.
Subject: DON Juan (Legendary character); spanish folklore; man- woman relationships

Title: La mujer

About: Article describing how women have been viewed by society. They are the ones to blame for everything and they turn into whatever the male wants. The article does state that what men want is an equal partner and encourages women. However, the article does remind the reader that women continue to be victimized in a variety of ways.

Title: Proverbios chinos acerca de la mujer
Creator: Pino y Madrid
About: Newspaper maxim on the type of women that should be respected and honored. " Los Dioses honran a la mujer que piensa para hablar."

Title: Eso ya lo sabía yo
Creator: [Unknown]
About: Short story about a woman that has to keep asking her neighbor for recipes that her husband wishes for her to prepare. After asking her neighbor for the recipes she would say, " I already know that" " Eso ya lo sabia yo." Her neighbor decides to trick her and tells her to put shoes in her habas enzapatadas. The story then explains how one should avoid being as absentminded as this female and should read the news, books, etc to learn from masters and to know how to act.
Subject: Christian Education; CONDUCT of life; ETHICS

Title: La mujer en acción
Creator: [Unknown]
About: Article detailing a conference given by Harriet Chalmers Adams, "La Mujer de Ibero-America." Goes on to dialogue about women's place stating that it's still, "en el hogar." It's also described how women in various parts of latin america are empowered or observed and what roles they are still expected to serve. " Con verdadera ligereza se afirma que el triunfo del femenismo destruira el fundamento moral de la familia y de la sociedad"
Subject: CHRISTIAN feminism; ETHICS; Women's rights; PROTESTANT Women

Title: ¿Qué puede hacer la mujer cristiana para remediar el mal?
Creator: [Unknown]
About: Essay describing what a good Cristian woman does in the face of evil, " get her own judgement out of the way so the will of God can reign."
Subject: CHRISTIAN Life; CHRISTIAN stewardship; RELIGIOUS life of women; WOMEN & religion

Title: La misión de la mujer cristiana
Creator: [Unknown]
About: Essay documenting a women's place in a man's life and moreover in the church. "En el orden de la Creacion, Adan fue formado antes que Eva; es, pues, cabeza de la mujer." "Cuando entre los corintios se emanciparon las cristianas de todas las conveniencias sociales en nombre de la libertad y de la igualdad, tuvo el apostol que recordarles la decencia natural, el velo como simbolo de la subordinacion de la mujer al varon."
Subject: DIDACTIC literature; SOCIAL conditions of women; WOMEN in the Bible

Title: La mujer cristiana
Creator: Martinez, Esperanza
About: Essay explaining what the role of the woman is in the home, in accordance with Christianity. It also states and reminds that women were saved through Jesus. Before Jesus women were " como una cosa y no como un ser racional, capaz de pensar y sentir y por lo tanto. indigna de tomar parte en las cuestiones que tendian al mejoramiento de la humanidad en sus diversas fases."
Subject: Christianity; Evangelists; Religion in literarure; Women & religion

Title: Los dejenerados

Title: La Mujer Americana
Creator: Pando Baura, Jose Luis
About: Essay detailing the differences between American women and American women from the south. Essay details that American women from the South draw from Spanish values of home and center around this. American women are more apt to fall into the role of. "feminists."
